functionDecorators.name: bulkSendETH
functionDecorators.description: Send the specified amounts of wei to the specified addresses.

parameterDecorators.name: addresses
parameterDecorators.description: Addresses to which to send wei.

parameterDecorators.name: amounts
parameterDecorators.description: Amounts for the corresponding addresses, the size of the array must be equal to the size of the addresses array.
